text:
This is a halal Korean restaurant, we appreciate that there is kids menu, making it easier for parents to consider this as a dining in option.

Some dishes were alright, some not so good. Service was good, restaurant and tablewares were clean as well. The soy garlic chicken (not captured) impressed us though, how well done it is.

Have been going here since 2021 and it‚Äôs still my favourite restaurant üò≠ really enjoy the food and service - the staff are very sweet and kind. I always leave the place with a happy and full stomach. Thank you ‚ù§Ô∏è

Came on Christmas day and was served by welcoming and friendly staff. Restaurant was not super crowded which makes it a great place to dine and catch up with friends (suitable for big groups, and baby chair available)!
Food was tasty and satisfying. Our favorite got to be the bibimbap and fried chicken wings!

A surprise find while looking for lunch after our shopping in Decathlon . Most of the foods we ordered were good except the portion of Rice cake , portion a bit too small to our liking . Hope they can improve on that . A plus point,  No GST and Service charge . Highly recommended !

An impromptu random find. Had amazing food and impeccable service. The staff were cheerful and very friendly. surprised to see that the restaurant was not full during break fast time in Ramadhan. Will definitely be back, despite the distance.
